channel.title: Wise Old man?
channel.description:
well talk about wise old man here!
[glow=red,2,300]the facts!!![/glow] [b]He lives in draynor village. first moved in had a black crummy hat. after bank robbery he has blue party hat. He robbed a bank. [/b] [glow=red,2,300]Facts about bank robbery![/glow] [b]Well, we do know the the WOM (wise old man) attacked/robbed a bank in Draynor Village right?, lol well notice how there are 3 players durring the cut-scene. Now look at the robbery very very closly! notice it says: examine (name here) when you put your mouse over a player! (or right click it!) so just right click any charecter in the sceen and be surprised! then Examine all of the players.
After the cut sceen turn off all chat options.Notice it says:"a player" or "a rich sage" "a vounerable and rich sage"
Ok then go onto a private server..any one with ::tele ::item and ::snpc or any npc spawning code ON now tele to where the cut sceen took place! (ill upload coords and pics latter sorry guys lol) Now spawn all 3 of the "players" in the cut sceen. just go to kulma.ath.cx/rs/npcs. Then search for "player" make sure you searched for the description kk? now spawn all of the 3 "players" using the spawn npc code! (::npc ::snpc ::spawnnpc ::npcSpawn) now make sure the npcs DO NOT WALK AWAY. then spawn a wise old man. make sure its a party hat one k?[/b] examine the players....notice how there npcs!
so if people tell you they were real players they werent lol
so talk about WISE OLD MAN!!!!!!!!! here lol
[move].....Motherload11.....[/move]

Need lvl 1 Thieving to rob the White house.

item.title: Wise Old man?
item.dc:creator: @motherload11 motherload11
item.description:
@motherload11 wrote:

well talk about wise old man here!

[glow=red,2,300]the facts!!![/glow]
He lives in draynor village.
first moved in had a black crummy hat.
after bank robbery he has blue party hat.
He robbed a bank.

[glow=red,2,300]Facts about bank robbery![/glow]
[b]Well, we do know the the WOM (wise old man) attacked/robbed a bank in Draynor Village right?, lol well notice how there are 3 players durring the cut-scene.
Now look at the robbery very very closly! notice it says: examine (name here) when you put your mouse over a player! (or right click it!)
so just right click any charecter in the sceen and be surprised!
then Examine all of the players.

After the cut sceen turn off all chat options.Notice it says:“a player”
or “a rich sage” “a vounerable and rich sage”

Ok then go onto a private server…any one with ::tele ::item and ::snpc or any npc spawning code ON
now tele to where the cut sceen took place! (ill upload coords and pics latter sorry guys lol) Now spawn all 3 of the “players” in the cut sceen.
just go to kulma.ath.cx/rs/npcs. Then search for “player” make sure you searched for the description kk? now spawn all of the 3 “players”
using the spawn npc code! (::npc ::snpc ::spawnnpc ::npcSpawn)
now make sure the npcs DO NOT WALK AWAY. then spawn a wise old man. make sure its a party hat one k?[/b]
examine the players…notice how there npcs!

so if people tell you they were real players they werent lol

so talk about WISE OLD MAN!!! here lol

[move]…Motherload11…[/move]
